&#3906;&#3940;&#3936;&#3851;&#3928;: [2873] rnam dag gam yang dag dang/ rnal ma dang/ legs po dang zol med pa/ ... las khur zol med gsha' ma len gyi yod/ ... slob sbyong gsha' ma byas pa/ ... yang yang dpyad na yin lugs gsha' ma rtogs yong/ ...

131 62.1, 62.6.  = bsha' ma; ngo thog gam rnam dag.  Dpe-chos 505.  rnal ma'am ngo thog.  Btsan-lha. gsha' mar chos rang byed pa'i mi de la dad pa dang brtson 'grus snying rus gsum du mi 'bral ba'i gzer 'debs dgos.  Zhi-byed Coll. IV 53.2.
